name: Spire Technologies
tagline: Portland Managed IT Support & Cloud Services Firm
description:
SpireTech provides Managed IT Services and Support to business clients in the Portland, OR Metro area.  "We’re in the IT business so you don’t have to be."
Help desk • Network administration • Cloud & hosting
IT management • Data security • IT Reviews and Planning
 
SpireTech can help with your Office365 and Azure support, migration, and management requirements.  SpireTech is a Direct Microsoft CSP holding the Silver SMB competency and subscribes to Microsoft Advanced Support for Partners.  This provides us with an increased level of competency, and priority response from Microsoft resources when needed.
SpireTech owns and operates a datacenter and offers a variety of hosting services to our clients, including:
- Server hosting, colocation, and management
- Website hosting
- Virtual Private Servers
- Cloud services
